basicInfo.name: Trude
basicInfo.flavor: Trude feels excitement battling strong opponents under the threat of life or death. This is her purpose in life. When she isn't able to find any opponents on the battlefield, she begins hunting ancient monsters that had been sealed away.

Normal Attack.desc:
Self
 - Heals HP equal to 20% of the caster's Physical Attack.
 - Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.
 - Self
 - Adds Healing: Heals HP equal to 20% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Reckless Charge
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crowd Control Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - 4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 125% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 150% of Physical Attack.
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Crowd Control Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Slash n' Bash
Skill 2.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Damage Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 58% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 68% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 37%.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Grants a Barrier equal to 155% of Physical Attack. [3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Battle High
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Pain Endurance. [Always Active]
 - Grants Block Rate Boost. [Always Active]
 - Revives with 80% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Boost to 60%.
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 100%.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Adds Effect: 100% Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: All meats, Karin, Sun Wukong, Freyja, chaos, strong foes, books, travel
profile.dislikes: Skuld, Radgrid, all vegetables, order, boredom, meetings, stuffy clothes
profile.story: Trude feels excitement battling strong opponents under the threat of life or death. This is her purpose in life. When she isn't able to find any opponents on the battlefield, she begins hunting ancient monsters that had been sealed away.

basicInfo.name: Trude
basicInfo.flavor: When Trude became unable to partake in a fight that she wanted to because of an incompetent senior officer, she went on a rampage, beating up all of her senior officers. This incident caused her to be well-known as a big troublemaker in the Celestial Realm.

Single Enemy

Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

 - Increases Damage: To 115% of Physical Attack.

Self

 - All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 53% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Crit Damage Boost to 22%.

Passive.desc:

 - Grants Block Rate Boost. [Always Active]

basicInfo.name: Trude
basicInfo.flavor: Trude is a member of [Ulfheddin], a unit made up of battle enthusiasts. However, she has issues with the oppressive command structure and obeying officers weaker than herself.

Single Enemy
